transcript.text: Hey friends, hope you're well.
Me- I'm good.

But what's cool is that this is a dog, we can leave the house and move around. It'll be fun

Not a good idea!
First thing to do is to serve him his food
A little news, not long ago Natsu hurt his paw.
Oh no..
In the elevator the doors are accordion doors
when they were opening they passed over Natsu's paw
and made a little wound
so I have to give him anti-inflammatories
liquid form
every morning for seven days.
a pleasure
The bright side is that I get to feel like Dr. House

Giving him this is why he loves us.
ok, that's not true!

he also likes me 'cause I'm beautiful
